io.micrometer.core.instrument.binder

Interface MeterBinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheMeterBinder, CaffeineCacheMetrics, ClassLoaderMetrics, DatabaseTableMetrics, DiskSpaceMetrics, EhCache2Metrics, ExecutorServiceMetrics, FileDescriptorMetrics, GuavaCacheMetrics, HazelcastCacheMetrics, HibernateMetrics, HystrixMetricsBinder, JCacheMetrics, JettyServerThreadPoolMetrics, JettyStatisticsMetrics, JvmGcMetrics, JvmMemoryMetrics, JvmThreadMetrics, KafkaConsumerMetrics, Log4j2Metrics, LogbackMetrics, PostgreSQLDatabaseMetrics, ProcessorMetrics, TomcatMetrics, UptimeMetrics

    public interface MeterBinder
    Binders register one or more metrics to provide information about the state of some aspect of the application or its container.

    Binders are enabled by default if they source data for an alert that is recommended for a production ready app.
